Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Ignus Chili Seeds^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
I can't wait to make some chili with these! Take this ^green;alloy^reset;: it should do you more good than I. Enjoy.
I love spicy foods but getting what I need here is a pain. Using a ^orange;Gene Design Lab^reset; could you perhaps make me some ^orange;Ignus Chili Seeds^reset;? I'd reward you for the effort.
